Class Star

java.lang.Object
  Star

public class Star
extends java.lang.Object

The Star class creates stars that can be collected. It takes in a prerendered image of a star as a buffered image, which is then converted into a graphics object. It requires two int inputs, x and y.

Author:
James Myoung
